channel.title: Trevor Arjeski's Site
channel.description: Recent content on Trevor Arjeski's Site

item.title: Test Post
item.description: This is a Test Test text A reminder how to create new posts From root of the project, run: $ hugo new posts/[title].md

I have 10 years of professional development experience (as of 2023). My technological interests include: FOSS, Linux, Unix tools / philosophy, various programming languages, text editors, tinkering. Favorite programming languages: C (best overall) Rust (best strongly typed) Haskell (best purely functional) Current technical aspirations: Make a commit to a Unix-like operating system Work full-time on open source software Be a maintainer of a large open source project
